text: Ezɨ duar kuraba atriviba inigha iza danganir kamɨn me akufa, me Hibrun akamɨn kamaghɨn danganir kam dɨbori, Armagedon.16:16 Ziar kam Armagedon kamakɨn, “Megidon Mɨghsɨam.” Fomɨra apaniba Israelia ko uariv sogha egha Atrivim Josaia mɨsoghezɨ an areme. Me Megidon nguibar ekiamɨn boroghɨra itima bizir kam oto. (Nɨ 2 Atriviba 23:29-30 ko 2 Eghaghaniba 35:20-24ɨn gan.) Kamaghɨn amizɨ, fofozir gumazir maba ghaze, ziar kam Megido bighavɨra mɨgeir puvatɨ. Me ghaze, an akar isɨn zuimɨn mɨdorozir gumaziba mangamin danganim mɨgei. Egh me mangɨ bar ikuvigh egh bar ovengam.
